title: Atmospheres & Elements
description: A pack of high-quality, seamlessly looping audio atmospheres and sound elements
longDescription:
Listen here: https://soundcloud.com/user-535451204/sets/atmospheres-elements?utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing


Details

Atmospheres & Elements is a comprehensive audio asset pack that provides all the sonic components needed to create effective, coherent, and atmospheric soundscapes within Unreal Engine.


Composed using a blend of original field recordings, instruments, and synthesis, these sounds are designed to add a sense of mood and immersion to any project. Whether you need a suspenseful and frightening soundscape for a dark abandoned spacecraft, or a serene and gentle progression for a sunny forest, this pack will provide the sonic elements needed to achieve your vision.


Along with 13 complete, ready-to-use soundscapes, the pack also contains a collection of 50 individual elements, from looping drones and rumbles to ambient swells and powerful hits. These allow endless possibilities for layering and can be combined and mixed with one another to create the exact soundscape you require.


Contents:

-         13 seamlessly looping atmospheres, each providing varying moods whilst maintaining a consistent aesthetic

-         50 looping elements, including drones, hits, and swells – designed for mixing in any combination to create custom, high-quality soundscapes
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 76

Number of Audio Cues: 76

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 104
